title: Smart Data Models - Agri Food
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic crop. This entity is primarily associated with the agricultural vertical and related IoT applications.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type. it has to be AgriCrop

agroVocConcept.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'. The link with the defined concept into the AgroVoc vocabulary

hasAgriSoil.description: Relationship. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'. Reference to the recommended types of soil suitable for growing this crop.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

hasAgriFertiliser.description: Relationship. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'. Reference to the recommended types of fertiliser suitable for growing this crop.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

hasAgriPest.description: Relationship. Reference to the pests known to attack this crop. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

harvestingInterval.description:
Property. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'. A list of the recommended harvesting interval date(s) for this crop. Specified using ISO8601 repeating date intervals:

**interval, description**

Where **interval** is in the form of **start date/end date**

--MM-DD/--MM-DD

Meaning repeat each year from this start date to this end date.

plantingFrom.description:
Property. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'. A list of the recommended planting interval date(s) for this crop. Specified using ISO8601 repeating date intervals:

**interval, description**

Where **interval** is in the form of **start date/end date**

--MM-DD/--MM-DD

Meaning repeat each year from this start date to this end date.

wateringFrequency.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'. Units:''. A description of the recommended watering schedule. A choice from an enumerated list. One of: **daily, weekly, biweekly, monthly, onDemand, other**. Enum:'daily, weekly, biweekly, monthly, onDemand,    other'
